description: Nicola first met Yuuri and Gwendel at her "wedding" where she escaped after hearing Yuuri`s speech about gloves and mates. She was delighted to learn that her rescuers include her lover Hube`s cousin. She was the one to change Hube`s views about humans. The couple fell in love and she was already pregnant by Lord Grisela "Hube" Geigenhuber when she met Yuuri. Nicola kept half of the Great Demon Flute which she gave to Yuuri.
name: Nicola
